Name: WARMA
About the game: Create your unique character and plunge into the open world! Be careful not to run into gopnikov, otherwise you risk being left without pants.Level up your character, buy and customize your car! Put huge rollers and drive around the area like a real gangster or build a real drift cramps and piled around the Kremlin walls sideways! Become the best players in the game WARMA ONLINE! Main features: Voice chat Open world Complete freedom of action Player interactions Character customization Vehicle customization The game WARMA develops and will develop throughout the period of early access.
